examples.example: 我乘坐飞机去远方旅行，欣赏美丽的风景，感受世界的广阔与奇妙。

translate.english: I take a plane to travel to a distant place, enjoy the beautiful scenery and feel the vastness and wonder of the world.

examples.example: 我通过努力工作攒够了钱，终于可以坐上飞机去向往已久的地方游玩了。

translate.english: I saved enough money through hard work and finally can take a plane to visit the place I have been longing for for a long time.

examples.example: 我期待着乘坐飞机去探索新的地方，开启一段精彩的旅程。

translate.english: I am looking forward to taking a plane to explore new places and start a wonderful journey.
